name: Module
helpText: The module is the container for all flows

version.helpText: The ikasan version used to build this module.

name.helpText: The name of the component as displayed on diagrams, space are encouraged, succinct is best. The name should be unique for the flow.

description.helpText: A more detailed description of the component that may assist in support.

applicationPackageName.helpText: The java package name for the generated module code.

port.helpText: The http port to be used by the blue console for this module.

h2DbPortNumber.helpText: The port to be used by the embedded H2 database.

h2WebPortNumber.helpText: The port to be used by the embedded H2 database to expose its web interface.
